snippet: The news agency’s bureau chief in Tehran was convicted by a special media court and awaits sentencing.
abstract: Special Iranian media court finds Parisa Hafezi, Tehran bureau chief of the Thomson Reuters news agency, guilty of propaganda-related offenses for video script describing a group of women involved in martial arts training as killers.
lead_paragraph: The news agency’s bureau chief in Tehran was convicted by a special media court and awaits sentencing.

headline.seo: Iran Court Finds Reuters Journalist Guilty of ‘Spreading Lies’
headline.main: Iran Court Finds Reuters Journalist Guilty of ‘Spreading Lies’
